allomancy.description: Can pull on metals, useful for drawing weapons or leaping through cities.

feruchemy.description: Stores weight, allowing the user to become lighter or heavier.

allomancy.description: Can push on metals, allowing rapid movement or throwing metal objects.

feruchemy.description: Stores physical speed, allowing for bursts of superhuman speed.

allomancy.description: Enhances senses like sight, hearing, and smell.

feruchemy.description: Stores senses, dulling them while storing and enhancing while tapping.

allomancy.description: Enhances physical strength and durability, useful in combat.

feruchemy.description: Stores physical strength, tapping grants bursts of power.

allomancy.description: Can riot emotions, pushing others to feel stronger emotions.

feruchemy.description: Stores mental speed, allowing faster thought processes.

allomancy.description: Can soothe emotions, calming people or manipulating moods.

feruchemy.description: Stores warmth, useful for surviving cold environments or heating up.

allomancy.description: Creates a 'coppercloud' that hides Allomantic activity.

feruchemy.description: Stores memories, allowing perfect recall of stored knowledge.
Stores wakefulness, useful for staying awake or skipping sleep.

allomancy.description: Wipes away all other metal reserves.

feruchemy.description: Stores identity, allowing anonymous interactions or forgery.

allomancy.description: Enhances the next Allomantic metal used drastically, but is consumed entirely.

feruchemy.description: Stores connection, useful for adjusting social ties or affiliations.

allomancy.description: Wipes away another Allomancer's metal reserves.

feruchemy.description: Stores Investiture, enabling storage of magical energy.

allomancy.description: Slows down time in a bubble, creating a temporal distortion.

feruchemy.description: Stores breath, useful for surviving in low-oxygen environments.

allomancy.description: Speeds up time in a bubble around the user.

feruchemy.description: Stores nutrition, allowing users to go without food.

allomancy.description: Shows alternate versions of oneself, based on different pasts.

feruchemy.description: Stores health, allowing fast healing when tapped.

allomancy.description: Shows one's own possible futures, useful for avoiding danger.
Turns a person into a Mistborn when consumed.
Allows a glimpse into the immediate future of others.

feruchemy.description: Stores age, granting youth or aging when tapped.

allomancy.description: Explosive and unstable; function is not fully known.

feruchemy.description: Possibly stores unknown attribute related to Harmony.
